Package database.statement.query

Class QuerySQLStatement

java.lang.Object
database.statement.query.QuerySQLStatement
public class QuerySQLStatement extends Object
A helper class used to construct an SQL query statement. Provides a fluent API with method chaining with the goal of making SQL statements easier to construct. This class provides the additional functionality of a query on top of the base functionality provided by BaseQuerySQLStatement.
Version:
1.0 - June 2nd 2023
Author:
Harry Xu

    • QuerySQLStatement

      public QuerySQLStatement(String[] columns, String table)
      Constructs this query with the columns and table name
      Parameters:
      columns - the selected columns
      table - the table to query
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if either of the columns or table arguments are null
      IllegalArgumentException - if columns is an empty array

      Returns:

      orderBy Specifies the order columns and the order direction
      Parameters:
      order - the ordering direction
      columns - the columns to order by
      Returns:
      this object to allow for method chaining
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the order or columns are null
